title: Preparing for the corroboree (A)
creator_credit: Australian Museum, Australia Council. Aboriginal Arts Board and Howard Hughes
brief_description: Filmed on Mornington Island, Queensland, an Aborigine, Jackson Jacob (Thunalgunaldin), explains the ritual associated with the holding of a corroboree.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Museum, Australia Council. Aboriginal Arts Board and Howard Hughes
